game

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    A Layer is a collection of GameObjects that holds a specific position in the draw order. Similar to layer systems in image editors. They are drawn (or not drawn) based on whether or not the GameObject is set to draw. If an object is added to a Layer, it will stop drawing on the normal interface. Layer visibility can be toggled, but is enabled by default.
